name: Exorcist Patrol
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51 (theme: every 10 seconds)

NOTE: Not all spell combos can do enough damage! See the tips below if stuck.

  1. Drag scrolls/cards onto a character's timeline.
  2. Your character will cast a scroll as long as the blocks don't overlap.
  3. Do enough damage by the end 10 secs to expel the ghost.
  4. If you don't do enough damage, everything will reset. Try out different combinations and timings!

If you get stuck

  1. Try this sequence for the first ghost
  2. Move around your scrolls so that their timing lines up and combo into each other.
  3. Restart and choose different spells than last time. Some spells are strong but hard to time. Some spells are weak but useful for positioning.

The music is Two Dancing Cranes (Asia Files) by dunkelbunt

This game was made by the 5x Train team.
